decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: The wording of Condition 2 attached to planning permission ref: P2024/0239/FUL, dated 17/10/2024, should now read as:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: 
Cover Letter (DP9, 25/01/2024); Planning Statement Rev.3 (DP9, March 2024); Statement of Community Involvement (Kanda, January 2024); 22.0051-100 - Site Location Plan (Hollaway, December 2023); 22.0051-101 - Existing and Proposed Block Plan (Hollaway, December 2023); 2137/EX/002 - Existing Basement Plan (Granit, 19/10/2021); 2137/EX/003 - Existing Ground Floor Plan (Granit, 19/10/2021); 2137/EX/004 - Existing First Floor Plan (Granit, 19/10/2021); 2137/EX/005 - Existing Second Floor Plan (Granit, 19/10/2021); 2137/EX/006 - Existing Roof Plan (Granit, 19/10/2021); 2137/EX/007 - Existing Sections (Granit, 19/10/2021); 2137/EX/008 - Existing Elevations Front and Rear (Granit, 19/10/2021); 2137/EX/009 - Existing Side Elevations (Granit, 19/10/2021); 22.0051-102 P2 - Proposed Ground Floor Masterplan (Hollaway, 09/05/2024); 22.0051-103 P2 - Proposed Basement Masterplan (Hollaway, 09/05/2024); 22.0051-104 P2 - Proposed Roof Plan (Hollaway, 09/05/2024); 22.0051-120 - Existing Basement Plan (Hollaway, February 2024); 22.0051-121 - Existing Ground Floor Plan (Hollaway, February 2024); 22.0051-122 - Existing First Floor Plan (Hollaway, February 2024); 22.0051-123 - Existing Second Floor Plan (Hollaway, February 2024); 22.0051-124 - Existing Roof Plan (Hollaway, February 2024); 22.0051-150 - Existing Elevations NW&NE (Hollaway, January 2024); 22.0051-151 Rev.P2 - Existing Elevations SE&SW (Hollaway, 09/05/2024); 22.0051-200 Rev.P3- Proposed North East/North West Elevations (Hollaway, 24/01/2025); 22.0051-201 Rev.P3- Proposed South East/South West Elevations (Hollaway, 24/01/2025); 22.0051-300 Rev.P2 - Proposed Section AA (Hollaway, 09/05/2024); 22.0051-301 Rev.P2 - Proposed Section BB (Hollaway, 09/05/2024); 22.0051-302 Rev.P2 - Proposed Section CC (Hollaway, 09/05/2024); 22.0051-303 Rev.P2 - Proposed Section DD (Hollaway, 09/05/2024); 22.0051-304 - Proposed Section EE (Hollaway, December 2023); F3587-A-100P Rev.P2 - Proposed Plan Basement (DeMicoli & Associates, 17/05/2024); F3587-A-101P Rev.P2 - Proposed Plan Level 0 (DeMicoli & Associates, 17/052024); F3587-A-102P Rev.P2 - Proposed Plan Level 1 (DeMicoli & Associates, 17/05/2024); F3587-A-103P Rev.P2 - Proposed Plan Level 2 (DeMicoli & Associates, 17/05/2024); 22.0051-210 Rev.P1 â€“ Proposed Plan L3 (Hollaway, 13/02/2025); F3587-50-03 - Central Core Stair Details (DeMicoli & Associates, May 2024); F3587-50-04P - Fire Escape Stair Details (DeMicoli & Associates, May 2024); F3587-D-101 - Wheelchair Accessible Room and Lift (DeMicoli & Associates, 03/04/2024); F3587-D-102 - Wheelchair Adaptable Room M4(2) (DeMicoli & Associates, 14/05/2024); Design and Access Statement Rev.P1 (Hollaway, 05/06/2024); Design and Access Statement Addendum (Hollaway, May 2024); PV Visibility Study (Hollaway, May 2024); UGF Calculation (June 2024); PUT-MD-01-001 Rev.A - Landscaping Plans (The Garden Taylor, 11/12/2023); Existing Area Schedule (Hollaway, 2024); Proposed Area Schedule (Hollaway, 2024); Daylight and Sunlight Report (Consil, 23/01/2024); Addendum Daylight and Sunlight Report (Consil, 06/06/2024); Sustainable Design and Construction Statement Rev.9 (TPS, June 2024); Drainage Strategy (Knapp Hicks & Partners, 11/03/2024); Sustainable Drainage Proforma; BREEAM Pre Assessment Report Rev.A (LP Energy, 22/01/2024); Fire Statement Rev.D (CHPK Fire Engineering, 22/01/2024); Transport Statement Rev.A (Motion, 19/01/2024); Framework Construction Management Plan (Motion, 15/01/2024); Site Waste Management Plan (Motion, 15/01/2024); Heritage Impact Assessment (Montague Evans, January 2024); Basement Engineer's Statement (LSY Engineering, 31/05/2024); Draft Operational Management Plan Rev.2 (Puttinu Cares, June 2024); Health Impact Assessment Screening; Noise Impact Assessment (Venta Acoustics, 01/05/2024); Travel Plan (Motion, 28/05/2024); Flood Risk Assessment (Knapp Hicks & Partners, 28/05/2024); Letter from DP9 dated 2 November 2021 ref: PT/REN/DP5779; Letter from Imperial London Hotels dated 10 May 2021; Letter from Keystone Law dated 19 October 2021 ref: PUT6/3/YPW; Letter from Colliers dated 15 September 2021 ref: CH/jd; Letter of Support (Great Ormond Street Hospital, 03/07/2024); Preliminary Ecological Appraisal (Greenspace Ecological Solutions, 11/09/2024). 
REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
description: Application for non-material amendments to planning permission reference P2024/0239/FUL, dated 17/10/2024, to allow for various amendments to the consented elevational design and materiality.
